review: Love it, buy them for every TV in the house. Send them as gifts. They're perfect.There are so many supported apps now that at this price, you can't afford not to own one of these, especially if you have an Android phone.I use my Chromecast just about everyday. It's incredibly simple and easy to use. It takes a couple minutes to setup and then in no time you'll be beaming things to your TV. And now with Android's screencast, you can bean your devices screen to the TV. It's pretty damn awesome..

review: This little device has made my cord cutting so much better.  I dreaded the need to yank out my hdmi cable from behind my TV and connect it to my laptop.  Now with this I can push almost any content (if latency isn't an issue) to my TV with a couple clicks.
